name: voidwriter - Dev Container
postStartCommand: npm run dev > /tmp/vite.log 2>&1 & sleep 3 && for i in {1..10}; do curl -s http://localhost:5173 > /dev/null && break || sleep 1; done; ( [ -n "$BROWSER" ] && $BROWSER http://localhost:5173 ) || xdg-open http://localhost:5173 || echo 'Dev server ready at http://localhost:5173' || true
